# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on a mixture of [Keep a Changelog] and [Common Changelog].
This project adheres to [Semantic Versioning], with the exception that minor releases may include breaking changes.

## [Unreleased]

## [2.3.0] - 2025-07-29

_If you are upgrading: please see [`UPGRADING.md`](UPGRADING.md#230)._

### Added

- üìù Add docstrings for raised errors for all methods ([#405]) ([**@nquetschlich**])
- ‚ú® Add Estimated Hellinger Distance as a further Figure of Merit ([#360]) ([**@flowerthrower**])

### Changed

- üé® Adjust the ESP reward calculation to become Qiskit v2 compatible ([#406]) ([**@nquetschlich**])
- ‚ú® Improve the ML part and its usability ([#403]) ([**@nquetschlich**])
- üìù Migrate the documentation from .rst to .md files ([#403]) ([**@nquetschlich**])
- ‚ú® Improve RL action handling by using dataclasses ([#401]) ([**@nquetschlich**])
- ‚ú® Support MQT Bench v2 and use Qiskit's Target to represent quantum devices ([#393]) ([**@nquetschlich**])
- üöö Move to MQT organization ([#385]) ([**@flowerthrower**])

## [2.2.0] - 2025-02-02

_üìö Refer to the [GitHub Release Notes](https://github.com/munich-quantum-toolkit/predictor/releases) for previous changelogs._
